com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data
Class BaseLoader<C extends BaseLoadConfig>

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.util.Observable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.BaseLoader<C>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loader
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataLoader, RemoteContentProvider, RemoteModelContentProvider
public abstract class BaseLoader<C extends BaseLoadConfig>
extends Observable
implements Loader

Default implementation of the Loader interface.

Events:
BeforeLoad : LoadEvent(loader, config)
Fires before a load operation. Listeners can set the doit field to false to cancel the action.
  • loader : this
  • config : the load config
Load : LoadEvent(loader, config, result)
Fires after the button is selected.
  • loader : this
  • config : the load config
  • result : the load result
LoadException : LoadEvent(loader, config, result)
Fires after the button is selected.
  • loader : this
  • config : the load config
  • result : the load result

Field Summary
 boolean reuseLoadConfig
          True to reuse the initial load config object (defaults to false).

useLoadConfig

public void useLoadConfig(C loadConfig)
Use the specified LoadConfig for all load calls. The reuseLoadConfig will be set to true.
